bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Application and User Guide for Gas-Insulated Transmission Lines, Rated 72.5 kV and Above
IEEE Guide for Application and User Guide for Gas-Insulated Transmission Lines, Rated 72.5 kV and Above

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Guidance for the planning, permitting, design, equipment specification, installation, commissioning, operation, and maintenance of gas-insulated transmission lines is provided in this project. Only technical aspects are addressed in this guide. Commercial and legal issues associated with gas-insulated transmission lines are not considered. This guide applies to ac transmission lines rated for maximum operating voltage of 72.5 kV and higher.

Guidance for the planning, permitting, design, equipment specification, installation, commissioning, operation, and maintenance of gas-insulated transmission lines is provided in this project. Only technical aspects are addressed in this guide. Commercial and legal issues associated with gas-insulated transmission lines are not considered. This guide applies to ac transmission lines rated for maximum operating voltage of 72.5 kV and higher.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
